summary: A grotesque fairy tale of fantasies in a 21-year old's mind. First he confessess to a priest about killing his aunt. Then he is sending parcels from the post office. Just when it appears ... See full summary »
cast: Wladyslaw Dewoyno|Krystyna Feldman|Wieslaw Golas|Robert Herubin|Gustaw Holoubek|Maria Klejdysz|Wanda Luczycka|Józef Pieracki|Miroslawa Zaborowska
title: Zabicie ciotki
